item.title: â€œä½ å±äºæˆ‘â€ï¼šæ³°å‹’Â·æ–¯å¨å¤«ç‰¹ï¼ˆTaylor Swift
item.description:
â€œä½ å±äºæˆ‘â€ï¼šæ³°å‹’Â·æ–¯å¨å¤«ç‰¹ï¼ˆTaylor Swift
Taylor Swift purchased the master recordings of her catalog, which were originally owned by Nashville record company Big Machine and sold to Ithaca Holdings (owned by Scooter Braun) in 2019.
